price: Indeed, it is Allah Who is the All-Provider[19], Lord of Power, the Mighty.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِينُ
footnotes: [19] He Provides His creatures with everything they need. Among His provisions is guidance.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
